title: Neuroinflammation & Memory Loss Research Fund
description: To support the research of Dr. Ruth Barrientos at CU Boulder devoted to investigating vulnerability factors leading to exaggerated neuroinflammation & memory loss (e.g. aging and unhealthy diet) and developing treatments to reverse these outcomes.
marketingContent: To support the research of Dr. Ruth Barrientos at CU Boulder devoted to investigating vulnerability factors leading to exaggerated neuroinflammation & memory loss (e.g. aging and unhealthy diet) and developing treatments to reverse these outcomes.
